com.lpoo.game.view.screens

Class MainMenuScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.lpoo.game.view.screens.MenuScreen
        • com.lpoo.game.view.screens.MainMenuScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NetworkingMenuScreen

    public class MainMenuScreen
extends MenuScreen
    A view representing the Main Menu screen. This Menu is presented to the User when the Application is initialized. In this Menu the User chooses what he wishes to do.
